eu.webtoolkit.jwt
Class WCssRule

java.lang.Object
  eu.webtoolkit.jwt.WCssRule
Direct Known Subclasses:
WCssTemplateRule, WCssTextRule
public abstract class WCssRule
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract rule in a CSS style sheet.

A rule presents CSS style properties that are applied to a selected set of elements.

Use getDeclarations() if you would like to use a widget as a template for specifying (and updating) a style rule, using the widgets style properties, or getDeclarations() if you wish to directly specify the CSS declarations.

See Also:
WCssStyleSheet
